---
title: "Pipeline summary Table"
author: "Nate Olson"
date: "5/9/2018"
output: bookdown::pdf_document2
---

```{r include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)
```


```{r}
read_tsv("data/pipeline_summary.tsv") %>% spread(Pipelines, Value) %>% 
      mutate(Measurand = factor(Measurand, 
                                     levels = c("Presence/Absence", 
                                                "Relative Abundance", 
                                                "Differential Abundance"))) %>%
      arrange(Measurand) %>% 
    kable(format = "latex", booktabs = TRUE) %>% 
    kableExtra::collapse_rows(columns = c(1,2))
```
